name: Pasta Primavera
instructions: Boil pasta. Sauté vegetables. Mix together.

name: Moong Dal Khichdi
instructions: Cook dal and rice with spices. Temper with ghee.

name: Spinach Curry
instructions: Sauté onion and tomato, add spinach and spices, cook until soft.

name: Almond Lassi
instructions: Blend soaked almonds with yogurt, honey, and cardamom. Serve chilled.
